content:
As of Wednesday, March 13, Russian ships are absent on the Black and Azov seas.

About thisreportNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

In the Mediterranean, there are 3 enemy ships, including 2 carriers of the Caliber winged missiles, a total volley of up to 12 rockets.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

  • 8 vessels to the Azov Sea, 4 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;
  • To the Black Sea - 13 vessels, 3 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.
The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas) by turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)

As reportedArmyinform, in the Navy of the Armed Forces, the Russian Tanker "Pogodin Mechanic" was destroyed in the area of Kinburn.
title: Russia has taken all ships to the base points in the Black and Azov Seas
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Mediterranean Sea 3 ...
author: Army Inform
